questions.question: Customs Clearance
questions.answer: The process of passing goods through customs

questions.question: Lead Time
questions.answer: Time between starting and finishing a process

questions.question: Bill of Lading
questions.answer: A receipt given by a carrier for goods shipped

questions.question: Tariff
questions.answer: A tax on imported or exported goods

questions.question: Freight Forwarding
questions.answer: Arranging the movement of cargo for others

questions.question: The company needs to comply ______ the new environmental regulations.
There has been a sharp increase in the demand ______ electric vehicles.
Our logistics team specializes ______ expedited air freight.
The rise in fuel prices had a significant impact ______ shipping costs.
Who is responsible ______ handling the customs documentation?

exercises.title: Reading: Global Supply Chains
exercises.text: Effective inventory (1) ______ is crucial for maintaining a smooth supply chain. Companies often (2) ______ from working with experienced freight (3) ______ who can navigate complex (4) ______ regulations. Reducing delivery (5) ______ times is a top priority for e-commerce businesses.
